channel.title: Uncharted 2: Among thieves
channel.description:
Can't be bothered explaining what the game is about, i'll just link you to the first reviews of it:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vPp9_ye5Fhc - written review: http://uk.ps3.ign.com/articles/102/1026373p1.html
http://www.gamesradar.com/ps3/uncharted-2-among-thieves/review/uncharted-2-among-thieves-review/a-2009091875511998094/g-200812159395546092
And it got a 10/10 from OPM US.
If you liked the original Uncharted, then i know you'll be wanting this, but if not - quickly run out and buy that game, then buy this when it comes out.
Oh and the multiplayer is brilliant, its comparable to Gears, but it is just so much better. Been loving the demo (Should be going public towards the end of the month).

item.title: Uncharted 2: Among thieves
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

goatee:

I thought the first uncharted was complete shit. Graphics aren’t everything.

And they certainly were not in Uncharted: Drakes fortune, i didn’t think the graphics were that great on it, it was the game that i liked. Oh and any reasons as to why you thought it was shit?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2009, 08:45:18 pm[/size][hr]Another video:

item.title: Uncharted 2: Among thieves

item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Looks very interesting, i agree with Unhandled about buying a PS3 for this, LittleBigPlanet and MGS.

Read full topic

item.title: Uncharted 2: Among thieves
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

You don’t buy a PS3 just for those two games, there are so many games already out that people just don’t know about because Sony doesn’t advertise their games properly, such as Killzone 2, MGS4, LittleBigPlanet, Uncharted, inFamous, Motorstorm: pacific rift, Socom: confrontation (its fixed now), etc… Then there are all the others yet to come out too, like God of war 3, Heavy rain, Gran turismo 5, Agent, The Last Guardian, etc.

Yeah, the Graphics are great. But this is Naughty dog who make the Uncharted games - the same people who have been with Sony as a first party since the PS1, created some of Playstation’s best franchises such as Crash bandicoot and Jak and Daxter, they have always known how to use the Playstation consoles properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Uncharted 2: Among thieves
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Holy shit the graphics look awesome. The gameplay almost reminded me of Assassins Creed, x999.

I’m seriously considering buying a PS3, just to play this and MAG.

Read full topic
